title: etti koLLe
sahitya:
etti koLLe gOpi rangana racce mAdhavarAya ninuvanalla


caraNam 1    karNada mAgAyi kadapali hoLeyuta eNNe maNiyu koraLali huliyuguru 
cinnada bAyoLu amrtava suriyutta beNNe hAlanumbuvenendu banda
    caraNam 2    ambegAlikkuda tumbiyol moreyuta cendada araLale nalitADuta 
bandu saraLanandadi bAya biDuda mukundanu moleyanumbuvenendu banda
    caraNam 3    bigida paTTeyali bAi taleyu hoLeyutire ciguTuta edada kaiyali kucava 
naguta nAkata gOpiya mukha nODuta mige nalinalidADuta purandara viTTala
